body:
This PR contains:

- New versions, `R2019b, R2016b, R2015b` that we use here in KAUST
- Automatically agree to license while doing silent installation
- Use `phases = ['configure', 'install']` to build the SW
- Add `@run_after('install')` method to fix 2 bugs that hit us here in KAUST
title: New matlab versions
